LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.0.label: Feeling great
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.0.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel great right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.1.label: Feeling good
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.1.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel good right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.2.label: Feeling bad
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.2.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel bad right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.3.label: Feeling terrible
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.3.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel terrible right now.
LanguageData.Imprisoned.stages.0.label: Φυλακισμένος imprisoned
LanguageData.Imprisoned.stages.0.description: Σιχαίνομαι να με έχουν κλειδωμένο I hate being locked up.
LanguageData.SharedBed.stages.0.label: sharing bed
LanguageData.SharedBed.stages.0.description: I have to share a bed with someone who I don't particularly want to.
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied.stages.0.label: Άφαυτος άποικος colonist left unburied
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied.stages.0.descriptio: Ένας από μας πέθανε και εμέις αφήνουμε το σώμα του να κείτεται στα ανοιχτά. Κανείς δεν το αξίζει αυτό. Όλοι οι άνθρωποι αξίζουν μία αξιοπρεπής ταφή One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. Nobody should be left like that. People deserve a decent burial.
LanguageData.Naked.stages.0.label: naked
LanguageData.Pain.stages.0.label: in a little pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.1.label: in a moderate amount of pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.2.label: experiencing acute pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.2.description: Make it stop... make it stop... make it stop...
LanguageData.Pain.stages.3.label: in shock from exceptional pain
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorSoothe.stages.0.label: psychic emanator soothe
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorSoothe.stages.0.descripti: The psychic emanator makes me feel strange, but also very relaxed.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.0.label: psychic soothe (medium)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.0.description: It's like a calming voice at the back of my mind, soothing me, settling my nerves.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.1.label: Ψυχικό δρόμενο (ελάχιστο) psychic drone (low)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.1.description: Νιώθω κάτι να με γαργαλάει το πίσω μέρος του μυαλού μου. Μια φωνή, ψιθυρίζει. Μπορώ να καταλάβω μόνο λίγες λέξεις, όμως δεν μου αρέσουν. It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.2.label: υχικό δρόμενο (κανονικό) psychic drone (medium)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.2.description: Νιώθω οτι κάποιος με παρακολουθεί και μου μιλάει. Η φωνή αλλάζει αλλά όχι το μύνημα. Μου λέει ότι πρέπει να βλάψω ανθρώπους. Κάντε το να φύγει! I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.3.label: Ψυχικό δρόμενο (Υψηλό) psychic drone (high)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.3.description: φωνή ειναι δυσβάσταχτα δυνατή. Είναι δύσκολο να συγκεντρωθείς. Βρίσκω τον εαυτό μου να μιλάει με αυτό, να του φωνάζει. Όμως αυτό συνεχίζει να ουρλιάζει! The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.4.label: Ψυχικό δρόμενο (Ακραίο) psychic drone (extreme)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.4.description: Η καρδιά μου σφυροκοπεί και ιδρώνω. Το μόνο που μπορώ να σκεφτώ είναι θάνατος και βάσανα. Είναι και όλοι οι εχθροί γύρο μου! Είναι ο εφιάλτης μου, ο εφιάλτης μου, ο εφιάλτης μου... My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...
LanguageData.Joywire.stages.0.label: joywire
LanguageData.Aurora.stages.0.label: beautiful aurora
